SEARCH
Package main.java.nn.layers

Class LinearLayer

java.lang.Object
main.java.nn.layers.Layer
main.java.nn.layers.LinearLayer
public class LinearLayer extends Layer
Implements a linear or fully connected layer within a neural network. This layer applies a linear transformation to the incoming data followed by an optional bias and an activation function.

  • Constructor Details

    • LinearLayer

      public LinearLayer(int in_features, int out_features, boolean bias, Layer.Activation activation)
      Constructs a LinearLayer with specified dimensions and optional bias.
      Parameters:
      in_features - The number of input features.
      out_features - The number of output features.
      bias - Whether or not to include a bias term.
      activation - The activation to be applied after the linear transformation.

  • Method Details

    • forward

      public Matrix forward(MultiDimObject input)
      Applies a linear transformation to the input data, adds bias if configured, and passes the result through the specified activation function.
      Specified by:
      forward in class Layer
      Parameters:
      input - The input MultiDimObject expected to be a Matrix representing a vector.
      Returns:
      A Matrix that is the result of the linear transformation, bias addition, and activation.
      Throws:
      RuntimeException - If the input is null or not a vector as required.

      public void set_execution_mode(ModelSettings.executionMode mode)
      Sets the execution mode for this layer.
      Specified by:

      Parameters:
      mode - The execution mode as defined in ModelSettings.executionMode.

    • get_parameters

      public ArrayList<MultiDimObject> get_parameters()
      Retrieves all trainable parameters of this layer, typically the weights and possibly the biases.
      Specified by:
      get_parameters in class Layer
      Returns:
      An ArrayList of MultiDimObject representing the trainable parameters of this layer.

      public void print()
